mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(boardno, name, rdate, categrpno, memberno) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(boardno), 0)+1 as boardno FROM board), #{name}, sysdate, #{categrpno}, #{memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT c.categrpno, c.name as categrp_name, t.boardno, t.name as board_name, t.memberno, t.rdate FROM categrp c, board t WHERE c.categrpno = t.categrpno ORDER BY c.categrpno ASC, t.boardno ASC

SELECT c.categrpno, c.name as categrp_name, t.boardno, t.categrpno, t.name as board_name, t.memberno, t.rdate FROM categrp c, board t WHERE (c.categrpno = #{categrpno}) AND (c.categrpno = t.categrpno) ORDER BY c.categrpno ASC, t.boardno ASC
